Description

Interface for intercepting JDBC calls.
JDBCConnectionPool
 
JDBCConnectionPool.RetryOptions
Retry options in terms of number of retries, delays and time units.
JDBCProxy
 
MiddleManJDBCDriver
 
Retry
Interface to perform asynchronous retry operations on supplier or runnable that may throw an exception.
Retry.Builder<T>
Retry builder to configure retry process with maxTries, delay, error handler, etc.
Retry.ErrorHandler
Handles errors happening during retry process.
Retry.Option
Retry options in terms of maximum numbers of tries, delay interval and time units.
Retry.Worker<T>
Class that actually performs asynchronous retries.

SimpleTry.TryImpl<T>
 
Try<T>
Interface to handle exceptions in a functional way.
Try.Failure<T>
Try's failure projection.
Try.Success<T>
Try's success projection.
TryException
Run-time exception which wraps checked exceptions.
Tuple<F,S>
Container for pair (first, second) objects.
Tuple3<F,S,T>
